post:
About noez.de
Noez.de is a prepaid based VPS, webspace and dedicated server provider, with high-quality hardware located in premium data centers in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
We have been providing hosting services since 2012.

Features
  • 100% Prepaid
  • Toll-free payment
  • Without notice
  • We are not a reseller
  • Many useful tools
  • Instant access to your server immediately after payment
  • Two-factor-authentication
  • DDoS protection up to 1 Tbps
  • Trained technicians
  • 24/7 monitoring
Discount
With the code "halloween19" there is a 35% discount for the first 3 months on the LXC / LXC SSD VPS. This discount is valid until November 3, 2019 and only if you pay directly for 3 months. Only while supplies last.

Order a LXC or LXC SSD VPS of your choice and select quarterly payment. If you enter the code "halloween19" at the end of the order process, you'll receive a 35% discount on the first payment.

Payment Methods
All servers are based on the prepaid principle. So you don‘t need to worry about endless contracts.
We accept Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Applepay, Bank Transfer, Google Wallet, Klarna, Mastercard, Maestro, Paypal, Paysafecard, Visa, Stripe, Sofortüberweisung, EPS, SEPA, Barzahlen, Giropay and iDEAL.

Information
Further information and offers are available on our website. For further questions and further information, please contact us at care@noez.de.

www.noez.de
